sys_script_include.name: SLX_Comparacion_fechas_estado

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_0902631f1b7690508802dac2cd4bcbe1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_hocsa_san.SLX_Comparacion_fechas_estado</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SLX_Comparacion_fechas_estado</name><script><![CDATA[var SLX_Comparacion_fechas_estado = Class.create();
SLX_Comparacion_fechas_estado.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	isDateToday: function(strDate) {
        // Se crean GlideDateTime para la fecha actual y para el campo ingresado
        var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
        var fieldDate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
        // Se obtiene la porcion de fecha (sin hora) de las variables
        var today = rightnow.getLocalDate();
        var istoday = fieldDate.getLocalDate();
		
		
        // se realiza la comparacion de fechas
        // si la comparacion es igual a 0, significa que los datos son iguales
        if (today.compareTo(istoday) == 0) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },
    type: 'SLX_Comparacion_fechas_estado'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bs</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-28 18:50:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>0902631f1b7690508802dac2cd4bcbe1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX_Comparacion_fechas_estado</sys_name><sys_package display_value="san" source="x_hocsa_san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0902631f1b7690508802dac2cd4bcbe1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-28 18:50:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
